description:
Debug Network Faster & Smarter with Proxyman

Proxyman is a high-performance Windows app, which enables developers to capture, inspect, and manipulate HTTP/HTTPS requests/responses with ease.
‚ú® Features
- Introduce the Custom Client Certificate for SSL Proxying.
- Add Shortcut Ctrl+1,2,3, to quickly switch between tabs in the main window.
- Able to repeat multiple requests at once.
- Able to create multiple Map Local Rules at once.

üêû Bugs
- Fixed: Sometimes Proxyman doens't revert the system proxy when the app is closed.
- Fixed: Could not open the Comment Dialog in the Diff View
- Fixed: Color highlight doesn't work
- Fixed: New requests show under wrong pinned domain
- Fixed: Flow is missing if it hits the Breakpoint Tool with Response Mode
- Fixed: Issue when Proxyman can't generate a Root Certificate in some Windows.
